text: Cumnock Academy is a secondary schoolEducation Scotland in Cumnock, East Ayrshire, Scotland.School web site Notable former pupils include Iona McDonald, Lord Lieutenant of Ayrshire and Arran since 2017;Gov.UK Bill Grant, MP for Ayr, Carrick and Cumnock; and Eric Caldow, a former Scottish international footballer. ==References== Category:Cumnock Category:Secondary schools in East Ayrshire
title: Cumnock Academy
